data.actual_result: It changes password, BUT.. It's still throws a bad request, with the response "Invalid two-factor code"
data.expected_result: It should change the password without throwing any errors
data.short_description: When changing password in user settings, then verifying the process with 2FA. You will receive a 400 (Bad request)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings - Change password and verify it with 2FA - Observe the console
